page.title: 08VILLAGES
page.content: Westwick. Westwick is a small village consisting of six houses south_east of Barnard Castle.It was mentioned in the original{Domesday Book}and was once owned by the Queen Mother's family,the Strathmores.It is surrounded by farmland in a rural area.The houses are let out to tenants.The{farm}(279 acres) has all the latest machinery. There are about seventy acres of barley,two hundred ewes and about seventy beef cattle.The people who live in Westwick are either farmers or retired.They go to shop in Barnard Castle and occasionally go to Darlington.Nowadays some of the buildings are put to a different use from the past.The pub,blacksmiths and the joiner's shop are now all private residences and the church is a barn. Westwick has a regular mail delivery.
